title: Kaitlan Collins Responds To Trump’s Rant Calling Her “Stupid And Nasty”: “Technically My Question Was About Venezuela”
description: After President Donald Trump derided (and misspelled the name of) CNN Chief White House Correspondent Kaitlan Collins, the reporter shot back with a response. In a rant posted to Truth Social, Trump wrote, “Caitlin Collin’s of Fake News CNN, always Stupid and Nasty.” He took umbrage with the journalist’s on-air reference to White House ballroom …

title: Prediction giant Kalshi strikes a new media partnership with CNBC, days after its CNN deal
description: Prediction site Kalshi is partnering with CNBC, days after striking a deal with CNN. Prediction sites are popular but getting regulatory pushback.

title: CNN pulls stories from Apple News feed, Semafor reports
